name: Legend of Tygydyk
description:
LoT - is a simple arcade where you play as an adorable cat named Tygydyk, who valiantly protects his house from mice day and night.

Unfortunately, he has to put up with annoying robo-vacuums.

Avoid robots, collect fishes and catch mice, that's all the rules.

This game was made as a homework for programming course, feel free to use the code https://github.com/PhoenixParadox/ProgrammingGameProject.
